column1:
Methedology:
1. Open ADB website 
2. What We Do > Projects & Tenders 
3. Scroll down to 'Related Documents' > All sovereign projects from 2005 onwards (xls) 
4. Click/dowload 'ADB Sovereign Projects (CSV)'
